Item ID3420

Limestone bricks can be crafted through the Crafting skill at level 12 by using a chisel with limestone, granting 6 Crafting experience. Note that you may inadvertently create a rock if you are too heavy-handed with the chisel.

Bricks can be purchased for 26 coins from the Stonemason in Keldagrim or for 21 coins from Razmire at his builders/general store in Mort'ton. Rasolo, the wandering merchant south-east of Baxtorian Falls, also sells one for 40 coins.

Limestone bricks are used in the Construction skill providing 20 construction experience each. Limestone bricks are also used in rebuilding the Mort'ton temple during the Shades of Mort'ton quest and minigame.

Note that you may inadvertently create a [[Rock_(limestone)|rock]] if you are too heavy-handed with the chisel. Bricks can be purchased for 26 coins from the [[Stonemason]] in [[Keldagrim]] or for 21 coins from [[Razmire Keelgan|Razmire]] at his [[Razmire Builders Merchants|builders]]/[[Razmire General Store|general store]] in [[Mort'ton]]. [[Rasolo]], the wandering merchant south-east of [[Baxtorian Falls]], also sells one for 40 coins. Limestone bricks are used in the [[Construction]] skill providing 20 construction experience each. Limestone bricks are also used in rebuilding the [[Mort'ton]] temple during the [[Shades of Mort'ton]] quest and [[Shades of Mort'ton (minigame)|minigame]]. ==Creation== {{Recipe |skill1 = Crafting |skill1lvl = 12 |skill1boostable = Yes |skill1exp = 6 |members = Yes |ticks = 0 |tools = Chisel |mat1 = Limestone |output1 = Limestone brick }} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Limestone brick}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Limestone brick}} ===Shop locations=== {{Store locations list|Limestone brick}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 26 April 2005 |update = Desert Month Finale |change = The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes |daterange = 26 January –
